themes: lack of transparency in funding criteria
confusing or unhelpful feedback from committees
disconnect between committees and local arts history
frustration with application rejection despite compliance
key_phrases: Never know what the funding committees are looking for
don't know the history of arts in Austin
submitted an application that met all the requirements to a tee and still got rejected
barriers_identified: committee members' lack of relevant knowledge
perceived bias or incompetence in decision-making
